ctx: intros sigma p H1 H2 H3 c.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat sigma : name -> data p : packet H1 : pBody p = Locked H2 : pBody p = Locked -> exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p H3 : forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t c : Client_index H4 : exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p The term "H4" has type "exists c : Client_index, valid_locked (queue (sigma Server)) (held (sigma (Client c))) c p" while it is expected to have type "held (sigma (Client c)) = true".

ctx: intros sigma p H1 H2 H3 c.
exceptions.exn: The reference H5 was not found in the current environment.

ctx: intros sigma p H1 H2 H3 c.
exceptions.exn: In environment num_Clients : nat sigma : Name -> Data p : packet H1 : pBody p = Locked H3 : forall n : Client_index, held (sigma (Client n)) = true -> exists t : list Client_index, queue (sigma Server) = n :: t c, c0 : Client_index H0 : pDst p = Client c0 H4 : held (sigma (Client c0)) = false x : list Client_index H2 : queue (sigma Server) = c0 :: x Unable to unify "false" with "held (sigma (Client c))".

original: intros sigma p H1 H2 H3 c. unfold locks_correct_locked in H2. unfold locks_correct in H3. specialize (H2 H1) as H4. specialize (H3 c H4) as H5. rewrite H5. reflexivity.
